# Yash Kapure

> Full Stack Web Developer and Frontend Engineer. React.js, Next.js, Node.js, MERN/MEVN stack. Based in the United Kingdom. Available for remote freelance work at $25–57/hour.

## About

- [Home](https://yashkapure.netlify.app): Portfolio overview, skills, experience, and contact.
- [Projects](https://yashkapure.netlify.app/projects): Web and mobile projects by Yash Kapure (React, Next.js, React-Native, MERN/MEVN).

## Services

- Full-stack web development (React.js, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript).
- MERN/MEVN stack development.
- React-Native development.
- Freelance remote work; hourly rate $25–57 USD.
